title: 2BD 2BA, Mountain views, Situated in Henderson!
posting_body: Seize your chance to make these peaceful, pet-friendly apartments set in the heart of Henderson, NV your home.
Conveniently located near the Cadence neighborhood with amazing city views of Las Vegas, make our community your new place to truly live!

Energy efficient appliances including built-in microwave, refrigerator, and dishwasher-Separate dining area-In-home washer and dryer                                                                                        Featured amenity-Private balcony or patio                                                                                        Featured amenity-Polished kitchen countertops-Mountain views-Oversized closets-Wood-style plank flooring                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity-Air conditioning with programmable thermostat                                                                                        Featured amenity-Ceiling fans in living areas and bedrooms
Onsite playground-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements-Move-in with NO SECURITY DEPOSIT:

Only a small one-time payment-Resident social lounge with shuffleboard table and foosball-Covered parking                                                                                         Featured amenity-Barbecue pavilion and picnic area-State-of-the-art fitness center                                                                                         Featured amenity-Professional onsite management-Fenced dog park with pet watering station                                                                                    Photo                                                                                                                                 Featured amenity-Worry-free 24-hour onsite maintenance
